body:
This fucking stupid author ruined a great series. Why would he inject this weird loli shit into a series that has such thicc babes? He didn’t even finish the extra art in here lol they’re all sketches. You can see his old art style is barely hanging on in the cover too, the characters look so shitty now compared to how they did in the last cover art. 

This could’ve been a great end to an almost perfect series but instead we get some fucked up version of the author’s loli incest fetish. Why did he make a prequel story too? Why not give the original girls more screen time? Fat fuck author ruined it
I need english TL of the extra that brown tomboy is yhe best!!!

Wait... This is incest... I wish I could say "where the problem at?" But it doesn't fit my fetish aghhhh!!! But well I can just imagine it not being them so hmmmm Edit: Last girl really sold it soo bad I love how he drew four different girls and with that ending? I'm sure there'll be more hahahaha a 10/10 for me. Well below 10 but with what the artist did to the last character? A definite 10 out of 10.
YESSSS The other characters are heeereee finalyyyyy omggg
Doesn't expect to have sequel wow
Did my guy impregnate the 1st girl he raped and then fuck their daughter years later? Yikes
